Articles.Content: I had a somewhat simplistic but kinda plausible idea for fixing the robotics drift, but I'm very inexperienced with mods so some help/someone telling me if this is even possible would be useful. Pretty much, my thinking is since the robotics drifting barely occurs in orbit due to the lack of external forces, the "fix" for the issue should just be to reset all forces on a craft every time it saves part positions. Like, save the position/motion data of the root part for reloading the craft in the correct location, but then set gravity/acceleration/rotational force to zero for the craft, give a few seconds for the craft to settle, and then save part positions. I believe this could be accomplished with the "OnSave" method and editing vehiclephysics.gravity but I don't know enough about this to have any clue if this is viable. Any assistance?
